entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
